caseTitle: M/s Independent Media Corporation (Pvt) Ltd. v. Province of Sindh thr. Chief Secretary, Sindh and others
tagline: The Sindh Sales Tax on Services Act, 2011, had repealed the Sindh Sales Tax Ordinance, 2000 but by virtue of section 83 had saved certain matters accrued thereunder which henceforth had to be administered by the Sindh Revenue Board, including the power to issue notifications exempting the collection of sales tax on service, accrued penalties and default charges.
